resources.string:
Welcome to the ArbitrageProductTracker!

 This application allows you to keep track of your selling inventory for your Retail Arbitrage quests! The application allows you to learn more about selling products online with links to helpful resources found below.

 There is page which allows you to add products to your inventory through either scanning a product UPC, or manually entering a product UPC.

 Your inventory keeps track of your stock that you have, and can be edited, deleted, and added to at your discretion.

 There are statistics given to you about your inventory which can help you analyze your current selling situation and make choices.
Learn about Amazon FBA from JungleScout
Get an eBook Link Texted of Retail Arbitrage by Chris Green!
Enter your number and click below!
No Products in Inventory. Add products to see statistics!
The Number of Items in your Inventory
The Most Expensive Item in your Inventory
The Average Price of your Inventory Items
Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested
The API\'s used in this application are:
EBay Product API for Product Fetching
Google Code Scanner for UPC Scanning

The textual content in this application is created by ourselves. The intents use external websites which are refrenced in the intent buttons which launch them. The app logo is created by us and any other documentation we used comes from the Android Developers Website.
BorjaBravo\'s READMORE Textview Extension on GitHub
Thank you for using our application! If you are ready to start your retail arbitrage endeavours then click the button below to find a nearby location to source for products. Happy Flipping!
